prospectus.	O

Grounds	B-SKIP
for	I-SKIP
termination	E-SKIP

The	O
obligations	O
of	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Underwriters	O
to	O
subscribe	O
or	O
procure	O
subscribers	O
for	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offer	O
Shares	O
are	O
subject	O
to	O
termination	O
if	O
certain	O
events,	O
including	O
force	O
majeure,	O
shall	O
occur	O
at	O
any	O
time	O
at	O
or	O
before	O
8:00	O
a.m.	O
(Hong	O
Kong	O
time)	O
on	O
the	O
Listing	O
Date.	O
The	O
Sole	O
Global	O
Coordinator	O
has	O
the	O
right,	O
in	O
its	O
sole	O
and	O
absolute	O
discretion,	O
to	O
terminate	O
the	O
obligations	O
of	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Underwriters	O
under	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Agreement	O
if	O
it	O
sees	O
fit	O
upon	O
the	O
occurrence	O
of	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
following	O
events:	O
(a)	O
there	O
has	O
come	O
to	O
the	O
notice	O
of	O
the	O
Sole	O
Global	O
Coordinator	O
that:	O
(i)	O
any	O
statement	O
contained	O
in	O
this	O
prospectus	O
("	O

Offer	O
Documents	O

)	O
considered	O
by	O
the	O
Sole	O
Global	O
Coordinator	O
(for	O
itself	O
and	O
on	O
behalf	O
of	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Underwriters)	O
in	O
its	O
sole	O
and	O
absolute	O
opinion	O
to	O
be	O
material	O
in	O
the	O
context	O
of	O
the	O
Global	O
Offering,	O
was,	O
when	O
it	O
was	O
issued,	O
untrue,	O

or	O
misleading	O
in	O
any	O
material	O
respect	O
or	O
that	O
any	O

expression	O
of	O
opinion,	O
intention	O
or	O
expectation	O
expressed	O
in	O
any	O
Offer	O
Documents	O
is	O
not,	O
in	O
the	O
sole	O
and	O
absolute	O
opinion	O
of	O
the	O
Sole	O
Global	O
Coordinator,	O
in	O
all	O
material	O
respects,	O
fair	O
and	O
honest	O
and	O
based	O
on	O
reasonable	O
assumptions,	O
when	O
taken	O
as	O
a	O
whole;	O

Scope	B-SKIP
of	I-SKIP
Review	E-SKIP

We	O
conducted	O
our	O
review	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Standard	O
on	O
Review	O
Engagements	O
2410	O
"	O

Review	O
of	O
Interim	O
Financial	O
Information	O
Performed	O
by	O
the	O
Independent	O
Auditor	O
of	O
the	O
Entity	O
"	O
("	O

HKSRE	O
2410	O

)	O
issued	O
by	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Institute	O
of	O
Certified	O
Public	O
Accountants.	O
A	O
review	O
of	O
these	O
condensed	O
consolidated	O
financial	O
statements	O
consists	O
of	O
making	O
inquiries,	O
primarily	O
of	O
persons	O
responsible	O
for	O
financial	O
and	O
accounting	O
matters,	O
and	O
applying	O
analytical	O
and	O
other	O
review	O
procedures.	O
A	O
review	O
is	O
substantially	O
less	O
in	O
scope	O
than	O
an	O
audit	O
conducted	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Standards	O
on	O
Auditing	O
and	O
consequently	O
does	O
not	O
enable	O
us	O
to	O
obtain	O
assurance	O
that	O
we	O
would	O
become	O
aware	O
of	O
all	O
significant	O
matters	O
that	O
might	O
be	O
identified	O
in	O
an	O
audit.	O
Accordingly,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
express	O
an	O
audit	O
opinion.	O

Conclusion	S-SKIP

Based	O
on	O
our	O
review,	O
nothing	O
has	O
come	O
to	O
our	O
attention	O
that	O
causes	O
us	O
to	O
believe	O
that	O
the	O
condensed	O
consolidated	O
financial	O
statements	O
are	O
not	O
prepared,	O
in	O
all	O
material	O
respects,	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
IAS	O
34.	O

on	O
